content: wrap it up scarf designed by carrie carpenter skill level intermediate finished measurements unblocked scarf measures approximately 10 /25 5cm wide x 55 /39 5cm long blocked scarf measures approximately 12 /30 5cm wide x 64 /162 5cm long materials  approximately 600yds dk weight yarn sample was made with 2 balls caron international s simply soft light #0005 key lime discontinued yarn  one size us g-6 4mm or size to obtain gauge  yarn needle gauge gauge is not critical for this project stitches used chain chain double_crochet double_crochet single_crochet single_crochet special
